General.RouteAlive: This is a live idempotent Route

Data.NotFound: The requested data could not be located
Data.NotAdded: The data could not be added
Data.NotEdited: The data could not be edited
Data.NotRemoved: The data could not be removed

File.NotRetrieved: The file could not be retrieved

Error.Unknown: An unknown error occurred during the request (see error for details)
Error.UnsuccessfulAdd: An error occurred when storing the data
Error.UnsuccessfulView: An error occurred when reading the data
Error.UnsuccessfulEdit: An error occurred when editing the data
Error.UnsuccessfulDelete: An error occurred when removing the data
Error.MissingPayload: An error occurred when parsing the payload which appeared empty
Error.InvalidArgument: The given URI argument was invalid
Error.InvalidType: The request argument type was invalid
Error.MethodNotAllowed: The request was denied due to invalid method
Error.RecordNotFound: The requested record does not exist
